document_data.name: Fyrillicus
document_data.mainbody: '''Fyrillius''' was a [[red dragon]] in the service of [[Orcus]] in the [[Abyss]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Fyrillicus patrolled the lands around the gate of the castle of Orcus.
document_data.History: Fyrillicus was spawned by a long line of red dragons that Orcus had subdued and brought to the Abyss and were larger than [[Prime Material Plane]] dragons.
document_data.Personality: The breeding process devised by Orcus had made Fyrillicus quite stupid. He always used the most direct approach. He was savage and cruel.
